Function.Description: The rank function returns a Vector containing the number of elements in each dimension of a Matrix.

Brief.Overview: The rank function returns a Vector containing the number of elements in each dimension of a Matrix. The length of the returned Vector is the rank of the Matrix.
Brief.Usage: The rank function should be used when you need to determine the number of elements in each dimension of a matrix.

Argument.Name: matrix
Argument.Note: The Matrix which you want to view the dimension list

Syntax.Return: Returns the number of values in a Matrix
